hero.title: Your favourite tools
hero.text_todo: A TODO list is a tool used to organize tasks that need to be complete
hero.text_note: A note app is a digital tool designed to help you capture, organize, and manage your notes efficiently.

accordion.first: How do I get started with Risat?
accordion.answer1: To get started, visit our website. You don't need to create an account to use the website.
accordion.second: What tools are available on Risat?
accordion.answer2: Risat brings together various tools in one place to make your workflow seamless. We offer several tools such as TodoList, Notes, and others.
accordion.answer3: Everything you write will be saved to your local storage.

about.title: About
about.description: Welcome to Risat! We are dedicated to providing a seamless experience by bringing all your favourite tools into one place. Whether youâ€™re writing, saving locally, or exploring new features, risat is here to make your tasks easier and more efficient. Our mission is to empower you with the best tools and resources in one convenient platform.
